gw.api.assignment

Class UserAssignee

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.assignment.UserAssignee
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assignee

    public class UserAssignee
extends Object
implements Assignee
    Used to assign an assignable bean to a particular user in a particular group. Both user and group must be specified.

    This assignee is implemented as a separate call, rather than just having the GroupUser entity implement Assignee, because it makes it easy to construct an assignee in cases where we don't have easy access to a GroupUser entity.

    A user assignee can be given a custom display key to display the combination of the group and user display names. The display key will be given the user display name as its first parameter and the groiup display name as its second parameter. The display key does not affect the equality or hash code of the assignee, just its toString method.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserAssignee(Group group, User user)
      Construct a new UserAssignee for the given group and user. Use the standard display key (Java.Assign.UserInGroupDisplay) to display the user and group if toString is called. Both group and user must be non null.
      UserAssignee(Group group, User user, com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey displayKey)
      Construct a new UserAssignee for the given group, user and display key. The display key is used to display the user and group if toString is called. Group, user and display key must all be non null.
      UserAssignee(GroupUser groupUser)
      Construct a new UserAssignee for group and user specified by the given GroupUser entity. Use the standard display key (Java.Assign.UserInGroupDisplay) to display the user and group if toString is called. Both group and user contained by the GroupUser must be non null.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assignToThis(Assignable assignableBean)
      Assign the given assignable entity to the group and user specified at construction.
      static Assignee createSimpleAssignee(Key groupId, Key userId)
      If both groupId and userId are non null, returns a UserAssignee object. If just groupId is non null returns the group. Otherwise throws an IllegalArgumentException
      String toString()
      Display the name of the assignee; uses the display key together with the display names of the user and group.

      • Methods inherited from class gw.api.assignment.Assignee

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

      • createSimpleAssignee

        Assignee createSimpleAssignee(Key groupId,
                            Key userId)
        If both groupId and userId are non null, returns a UserAssignee object. If just groupId is non null returns the group. Otherwise throws an IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        groupId - the id of the group to which the item is to be assigned, never null
        userId - the id of the user to which the item is to be assigned, can be null
        Returns:
        an assignee that can be used to assign an item to the given group and (optional) user
